posts.caption: Today we’re going to design my dream wedding venue, and when I say my I mean yours. So, what makes the design of any wedding venue great? For example, every wedding venue comes practically empty and it’s our job to spice things up. Since we all have different tastes, it could be the lighting, the flowers, the view, the location, all these things. With those four things in mind, let’s gather some inspiration and design my wedding venue.

posts.caption: Intimate Wedding Reception Ideas: when small weddings mean big design.  The past few weeks have seen massive changes for us all in every corner of our lives. It’s no secret that people are completely re-thinking how they do business, how they connect with their loved ones, and how they simply approach their day-to-day lives. Of course, these changes have bled into how we gather and celebrate major events in life.

posts.subject: pet

comments.content: I made this for my kids, who are usually sooooooo picky. Seriously, the younger one only eats PB&J and the oldest only eats chicken nuggets. I know, I know, it's not a healthy diet, but what am I to do? I've tried sneaking vegetables into the nuggets and the PB&J sandwich, but the kids caught on and they threw the food in the toilet, which of course clogged the toilet and caused it to overflow, and all this happened while my husband was out of town again, so ... sorry, where was I going with this? Oh yeah, so the chicken soup ...
Apparently you just freeze the stuff. Oh but you need a tray. That's how they get ya.
This is like a dream come true... Can't wait to build may personal pc...
I feel sorry for gamers trying to build a decent rig this year, a mid range GPU alone now costs more than the whole rig I built in May 2020 with a mid range GPU.
Cats are literally my favorite on this
